entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
